data.title: AFI’s 100 YEARS…100 LAUGHS
data.meta_description: AFI's 100 Years...100 Laughs is a list of the 100 funniest American films of all time.Regardless of genre, the films on this list possess a total comedic impact that creates an experience greater than the sum of the smiles. These movies provide laughs that echo across time, enriching America's film heritage and inspiring artists and audiences today.The AFI's 100 Years...100 Laughs television special, hosted by Drew Barrymore, originally aired June 13, 2000 on CBS.A wide array of funny films — from slapstick comedy to romantic comedy; from satire and black comedy to musical comedy; from comedy of manners to comedy of errors — were nominated for this distinction.[vc_colu
data.text:
This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible. Cookie information is stored in your browser and performs functions such as recognising you when you return to our website and helping our team to understand which sections of the website you find most interesting and useful.

You can adjust all of your cookie settings by navigating the tabs on the left hand side.
